body.name: YONHAN Battery Charger 10-Amp 12V and 24V Fully-Automatic Smart Car Battery Charger, Battery Maintainer Trickle Charger, and Battery Desulfator with Temperature Compensation
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 47 mins
features: [All in One, Keep your battery charged and your car ready to go] Battery Charger automotive 10-Amp 12V and 24V Fully-Automatic Smart, It's smaller but delivers more power. It's the all-in-one solution battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, plus battery desulfator. Charge or repair all 12V and 24V lead-acid automotive, marine, and deep-cycle batteries, including AGM, GEL, SLA, and Flooded in cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, lawnmowers, boats, marine, etc.

[Enjoy Precision Charging, Your car deserves the best] Using a backlit LCD, the battery charger automotive clearly and visibly shows an LCD screen displaying the charging status and battery status; An integrated thermal sensor detects the ambient temperature and alters the charge to eliminate over-charging in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates.

[Restore your Battery, Don't let a dead battery ruin your plans] Built-in advanced battery REPAIR mode to help to recover old/idle batteries and extend battery life. Please use repair mode if the car battery charger cannot charge the battery. The high-frequency and low-frequency pulse technology has good repair and activation effects. Note: It can not activate a dead battery or repair a damaged battery. LITHIUM BATTERIES ARE NOT ALLOWED

[8 Charging Protection, Never get stranded again] The charging cable contains heat-resistant and oxidation-resistant copper wire, which is not easy to break. It has protection circuits such as overcharge/overvoltage/overcurrent/short course, with functions such as overcurrent protection, short circuit protection, reverse connection protection, overheat protection, overvoltage protection, and Undervoltage protection.

[Intelligent Memory] The Car Battery Charger mode has a memory function. After charging, it defaults to the state mode used before the last power failure. no complicated steps, just plug and charge. Note: Note: It‘s car battery charger, only the battery charging function. Requires power connection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 12/24V Battery Charger with Repair Function
reviews.reviewText: My 6-year-old Audi Q5 can start OK, because it has a strong starter (has auto start/off) but because of it's low state of charge, that function no longer works. I bought a trickle charger before this one which charged well on a 2019 Corolla that's being driven very little and infrequent but not on my 2018 Audi Q5. That other trickle charger charged my battery from 11.7 to 11.9V. I bought this charger due to it has a separate mode for AGM and Repair because my Audi battery is AGM. FYI, manual says you need to wait at least an hour from the last usage of your battery.So, I first charged it in the AGM mode and the display went from 50% to 100% in only 10 minutes but the voltage only improved to 12V. Yesterday I put it on repair mode, and it took 8 hours to show full. I did not wait for it to turn off by itself. The battery now has improved from 12V to 12.55V; from 50% to 80% capacity on a 6-year-old large AGM battery. I did not bother to remove the power cords due to my bad back and the battery is situated in the trunk all the way behind the backseat. Luckily it does not appear to cause any damage to my car. During the repair mode, I monitored the battery temperature with my laser thermometer; the charger nor the battery did not get warm and stayed in the low 70's.PROS:1) Has separate AGM and Motorcycle and repair mode.2) Great LCD lighted display will show the battery level when you hook it up even before you plug in the power cord. It will also show charger temperature, charging current & status, battery voltage & etc.3) Smart charger has a built-in fan to stay cool and it will alter the charging power with respect to the battery status. It will start out slow and rarely goes to the full 10A, then it will decrease the power when you reached half full then even lower at 75%. Even when it's @100% charged, it will trickle charge to the max then turn itself off (fan off but light still on) and display OFF.4) Great repair mode that reconditioned my 6 year old AGM battery from 50% to 80% capacity.5) Very good price; I paid $24 shipped.CONS:1) Very short cord, you will need an extension cord. But it's no big deal.2) Per owner's manual, in Motorcycle mode, it will charge battery to full then turn off and turn back on when voltage drops below 12.5V. But does that mean you cannot maintain your battery in the other modes? It also states not to leave the charger unattended over 12 hours. Therefore, I don't think this is a battery maintainer which is fine for me.................................................................With this battery charger, I can charge my batteries before and after I go on a vacation and let not my batteries charge level go down too low thus prolongs the life of my batteries. I only had it for a week and so far, I am very happy about this product. I will update if the charger quit or have some problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functionally excellent and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: The unit is straightforward to use and the desulfurization feature is a real plus. Seems well constructed.Successfully used on two batteries , one that I was ready to give up on.Very reasonable;y priced for the features!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recharges, but not good instructions
reviews.reviewText: The product works, and has some good features. But the instructions are not very helpful. It's hard to know which mode to use for which kind of battery. It's also hard to know how to use with a car where the battery is installed somewhere else. My car battery wouldn't charge because I was using the engine as ground. I had to figure out myself that you have to use a special ground lug to charge the battery under the hood. (The positive lug was easy to find). ALso, it's unclear how and when to use the Repair function. If you have access to the car battery, just set it for the normal mode and it should work. I also had to watch youtube to figure out why the selector times out and how to reset it. ALso, battery maintenance/trickle can only be done on the motorcycle mode. Took quite a while to figure it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kept my car running for a week, until the new alternator could be installed. Easy to use, worked perfectly. Light weight, so this old grandma had no trouble carrying it. Easy to read the display. Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YONHAN Battery Charger: Power Up Your Vehicle with Smart Precision!
reviews.reviewText: Revitalize your vehicle's battery with the YONHAN Battery Charger – a 10-Amp powerhouse designed for 12V and 24V systems. More than just a charger, it's a fully-automatic smart solution that doubles as a battery maintainer, trickle charger, and desulfator. With temperature compensation ensuring optimal performance, it's your vehicle's best friend in the realm of battery care.Pros:Smart Precision: Fully-automatic operation for hassle-free charging, maintaining, and desulfating.Versatile Voltage: Compatible with both 12V and 24V systems, making it suitable for various vehicles.Temperature Compensation: Adjusts charging parameters based on temperature, optimizing battery performance.Multipurpose Marvel: Acts as a battery maintainer and trickle charger, extending battery life.Great Customer Service:Battery Care Wizards: Have questions about battery care? The YONHAN team is like your personal battery care wizards, ready to ensure your vehicle stays charged and ready to roll.Cons:Jealous Batteries: Warning – other batteries might get jealous of the VIP treatment your vehicle's battery receives!
